name: Tides
author: The Artifice

sections.description:
Do you publish posts about Anime, Film, TV, Animation, Manga, Comics, Games, Literature, Arts, or Writing?

Whenever you publish a post, you will receive a reference code that you can use to submit it to The Artifice Tides.

Once your post has been submitted to Tides, it will be available to a widespread audience.

Everything is completely free.

Arbitrary section
sections.installation: Once you have activated the plugin and published a post, a box will appear with the reference code that you can use to publish your post to Tides.
sections.faq:
How does it work?

Once you have activated the plugin and published a post, a box will appear with the reference code that you can use to publish your post to Tides.

short_description: Do you publish posts about Anime, Film, Animation, Manga, Comics, Games, Literature, Arts, or Writing? Submit to Tides to expand your readership.
